channel.title: Posts on Lorenzo Hill Front-End Dev Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Lorenzo Hill Front-End Dev Website

item.title: CSS Landing Page
item.description: Picking up the CSS flexbox properties was something else. When I started the lessons, I thought it was going to be fine. It was just just laying out the boxes that would lay out how the website looks on a page. I was wrong in that thought. One of my first shortcomings was that my HTML was not formatted correctly and was not readable. One of the problems that I had with formatting was somewhere I missed the closing tag for a div.

item.title: The Odin Project Foundations: HTML basics and CSS
item.description: I started The Odin Project (TOP) in June of 2022. I have had some experience in HTML. When I was about 12, I would play around with the basic of HTML making basic websites that were just really comprised of heading Elements and they basically looked like this. <html> <body> <h1>This is a heading<h1> <p>Hello World</p> </body> </html> It was nothing too flashy, Just some HTML code to show up in a browser.
